item.description:
Let’s have a dying party! Heather has offered to host us at her house.
I’ll order the yarn and dyes from Knitpicks and get all the supplies. There will be a $5 cover charge to off set the cost of the dyes, squirt bottles and gloves. The more people who come the more dye colors we can buy so the more the merrier.

There are two things you’ll need to do if you want to hand dye your own yarn,
1. RSVP no later than Friday September 5th!
2. Tell Steph what you’d like to dye and how many you’d like, here are the options
a. Bare 25% Nylon Yarn $6.29 for 462 yards
b. Bare 30% Silk Yarn $6.99 for 440 yards
c. Bare 25% Nylon Blank $11.99 for 462 yards
d. Bare WORSTED Yarn $3.79 for 220 yards

The Party will be Saturday September 27th with a rain date of Saturday October 4th.


Note: this is not the exact address, I'm guessing. Heather will you clarify?
item.name: Dying Party -Sat October 4, rain date
